transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Sir call kar raha hu call pick nahi kar rahe ho char panch bar call kara maine aapko.
Executive: Kidhar isme ye hai number tha.
Customer: Wo number hai video me hu mai sir baat to samajh rahe hai meri.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Jo video me hu video me wo hu mai.
Executive: Wahi hu mai.
Customer: Wahi call kar raha hai aapko.
Executive: Abhi dekhiye mai idhar change kiya number.
Customer: Number change ho gaya sir.
Executive: Haan edit pe jaiye edit pe jaiye edit pe check edit pe.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Check kar lijiye ho gaya first second second first.
Customer: Haan ho gaya ho gaya ho gaya.
Executive: Ho gaya paye hai aap khush hai.
Customer: Haan satisfied.
Executive: Ab aapko ab aapko ek cheez aur karna hai aap service ko upgrade kara lijiye sir kyuki aapke pass lead bahut kam aa rahi hai aapke pass matr 17 lead aa rahi hai.
Customer: Haan upgrade.
Executive: 17 by lead aa rahi hai weekly.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ab aapke pass 34 by lead ho jayegi double double.
Customer: Haan double hai.
Executive: Double nahi hai double ho jayegi.
Customer: Haan kaisa abhi kya karne ka bhai.
Executive: Isme aapki ek normal service bhi chal rahi hai sir ek aapka jo chal raha hai na ye aapka MDC ka service chal raha hai aapko malum hoga hai na MDC ki service me kya hota hai local package hota hai jo ki normally 90% log India me use karte hai jaise aap bhi use kar rahe ho isme aapko daily ka ek bonus milta hai jo ki aapko bonus milta hoga aap dekhte hai dekho fast transaction me jao fast transaction last me last me.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Last me jaye last me.
Customer: Upar.
Executive: So not.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Fast transaction okay.
Executive: Transaction ke side me hai consume date ke side me consume date ke side me.
Customer: Upar upar idhar idhar sir idhar upar starting me upar ha wahi wahi jaha sahi aate udhar udhar idhar ha idhar idhar sahi sahi hai sir is side is side is side left hand side pe left hand side pe.
Customer: Haan fast starting me.
Executive: Sir starting me start relevant recent likha hai jaha.
Customer: Relevant sir relevant.
Executive: Sir relevant recent likha hai jaha pe dekha upar dekho upar is side pe left hand side pe.
Customer: Haan relevant hai ha relevant hai.
Executive: Niche niche uske niche likha hai transaction history transaction history likha hua dekhiye uske niche us pe click kariye.
Customer: Kya hai.
Executive: Yaha se aapko malum chalega ki aap kitni valid use karte hai aur kitni valid 24 hours ke andar lapse ho jati hai khatam ho jati hai dekho.
Customer: Haan haan haan okay.
Executive: Okay okay scroll karo niche jao niche jao dekhenge aapko pata chalega 14 valid 18 valid aapne use kari hai ek din me.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To aise use nahi karna hai aapko.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Ye red red zone dekh rahe hai jo lal color ka bana hua dikh raha hai aapko.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Red lens red color ka bana kya likha kya likha hua padhe sir ek bar ha wahi wahi usi pe ja rahe the.
Customer: Unused unused daily bonus by lead India mart India mart.
Executive: Daily daily bonus by lead jo bonus by lead aapke pass aati hai mai aapko batata hu clear voice me aapke pass daily basis pe ek bonus aata hai one one by lead lene ki visibility aati hai aap ek hi le sakte hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai ab ek by lead ko aap 24 ghante ke andar use nahi karoge to agle din wo khatam ho jayegi.
Customer: Ye kitna 24 ghanta.
Executive: 24 ghante ke andar andar ek by lead use karna hi karna hai daily basis pe.
Customer: Okay isliye aapke aapko total jo by lead aati hai 17 by lead aati hai aur 17 by lead ke according aapke pass jo customer hai wo jyada hai aur by lead aapke pass kam hai.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: To aapko kahi na kahi by lead badhana padega.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To by lead badhane ke liye aap service ko upgrade karana padega abhi aapki MDC ki service chal rahi hai na yahi se aapko trust seal ki service me chale jana padega trust seal ke service me aapko ha trust seal ki service me usme kya hoga aapko directly total.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Trust seal ki service me aapke pass total 34 valid ho jayega abhi 17 mil rahi hai na weekly us time double ho jayegi.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Double jaise hi ho jayegi 34 valid ho jayegi 34 valid hone ke baad aapke pass lead jyada aane lagegi aapke pass number of call jyada aane lagenge.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Samajh aa raha hai sir.
Customer: Hmm okay.
Customer: Ye kaise service update karne ka.
Executive: MDC se samajh aa raha hai sir.
Customer: Haan MDC se kaise change karna hai.
Executive: Which type of language sir.
Customer: Hello ha comfort hai comfort hai to kaise MDC me hai na service ko kaise service me comfortable hota sir.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Hindi samajhta sir thoda thoda.
Customer: Haan samajhta hai.
Executive: Ab mera baat samjha tha kya bola.
Customer: Samajhta hai.
Executive: Hum aapke pass ek week me ek hafta me 17 by lead hota hai aata hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan ab aapko update karane service ko to ab aapke pass 34 valid ho jayega double.
Customer: Haan samajh gaya.
Executive: Uske liye nahi sunai padta hai.
Executive: Sir aap meri baat ko samajh rahe hai aawaz aa rahi hai.
Customer: Abhi aa raha hai disturbance hai.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye line pe rukiye.
Executive: [unintelligible] full [unintelligible] nodta [unintelligible].
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was not receiving calls.

- Wants to upgrade the service.

- Wants to know how to update service.



Resolution:

- Executive changed the number.

- Explained about MDC service.

- Explained about TrustSeal service.

- Explained about daily bonus buyleads.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, buyleads, mdc, trustseal, upgrade
